page.title: 02ARTS & CRAFTS:BED'HM:HED'HM
page.content: A wide selection of crafts is pract- ised in these parishes,from very high quality embroidery to the repair of old violins & making wooden toys;an above average skill at sewing,dress- making,soft-toy making,furniture reno- vation,reupholstery & in all branches of cookery & catering is to be found.1 young girl can ice a fine wedding cake & several wives bake their own bread; in fact one can dine far better in a friend's home than in many a restau- rant! The average countryman is a competent & experienced gardener as often is his wife,& incomers too gar- den to a high standard,often having a wide knowledge of plants. Local W.I. markets encourage the pro- duction of crafts & plants by providing an outlet for their sale, from which young mothers & pensioners alike,can supplement their incomes.
